name: Python Docs Bathys Updated
description:
Dark Bathys theme (inspired by the GT Deepdark theme) for the Python Docs, updated with less aggressive colors and other tweaks.

Original style by inductiveload
additional_info:
Tweaks and Additions
  • Removed unnecessary !important directives.
  • Added rules for inline code blocks.
  • Changed the colors of the quick search to look nicer.
  • Changed table backgrounds to a nice alternating row pattern.
The css is otherwise a straight copy from style 102245 Credits The majority of the css was duplicated from the style, Python Docs Bathys by inductiveload
